column4: hi all. one question, i have installed java using dpkg -i from a deb in my home directory, and i left that .deb there, but now it is getting in my way, can i delete that deb from my homedir and still have java work?
and by java working, i mean packaging related to java
you can delete the .deb file, it is just an installer
and if i ever decide to remove the package, dpkg wont complain that the deb is missing?
